Posts.Content: HI, i think i may make a doctors appointment tomorrow but just wanted others advice. every now and then i get upper left aching back pain but this time since yesterday it is worse than i have had it before just wondered if anyone else had had this and what it could be, plus this morning i found a lump that i can move in my left armpit, slightly tender. anyone had anything similar? thought id also mention that im 21 weeks pregnant. thanks in advance.
Posts.Title: upper left back pain and found lump unders skin in armpit
